body_html:
Yes, I have checked that out @alquraishi. I want to use it for sequence classification purposes i.e. assigning a single label to a whole sequence. I am not sure how to use it for that purpose. An example like this:
https://github.com/aymericdamien/TensorFlow-Examples/blob/master/examples/3%20-%20Neural%20Networks/recurrent_network.py
will surely help a lot in understanding.

body:
Yes, I have checked that out @alquraishi. I want to use it for sequence classification purposes i.e. assigning a single label to a whole sequence. I am not sure how to use it for that purpose. An example like this: 
https://github.com/aymericdamien/TensorFlow-Examples/blob/master/examples/3%20-%20Neural%20Networks/recurrent_network.py
will surely help a lot in understanding.
